will only be used for that purpose. The survey does not ask you for your name. For more details
about the Forum, go to our website www.oawnf.org.
Please leave your completed survey at the Oulton Institute, Quarry Hill or the post office in
Aberford Road or at NisA in the Beechwood Centre, by June 1st. If more than one member of
your household wants to complete this survey, further copies are available at the Aberford Road
post office. The more completed surveys we receive the better will be our plan!
